title: Need to be honored to get an S?
body: So I've been hearing this ALOT lately, no one can point to a post, but everyone swears that their challenger, diamond, etc, friend told them you have to be honored before receiving an S-/S/S+ grade. This has got to be nonsense right?

replies.body:
ill debunk this myth right now, i played a thresh ranked. got a S.
 was never honored because cause they all honored my adc even tho he only got an A+
Yup, whether you get honored or not has nothing to do with your ranking.
Thought so, gotta love the people who just make random stuff up. Thanks guys.
